ARABIC: وَمِن قَوْمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٌ يَهْدُونَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعْدِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Among the people of Musa there is a group who guide by the truth and act justly in accordance with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Among the people of Moses is a section that shows the way to the truth, and deals justly in accordance with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Among the people of Moses' there was a party who guided others in the way of the truth and established justice in its light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Among the people of Moses are some whose guidance and Judgment are based on the Truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And among the people of Moosa is a group that shows the true path, and establishes justice with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And of the people of Musa there is a community who lead (the men) with truth and establish justice therewith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And of Musa's people was a party who guided (people) with the truth, and thereby did they do justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Of the people of Moses there is a nation who guide by the truth, and by it act with justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And of Moses' folk there is a community who lead with truth and establish justice therewith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Yet there is a group among the people of Moses who guide with truth and act justly in accordance with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And of the people of Musa there is a community guiding others by the truth and judging thereby.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Among the people of Moses is a nation who guide [the people] by the truth and do justice thereby.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of the people of Moses there is a section who guide and do justice in the light of truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And of the people of Musa (Moses) there is a community who lead (the men) with truth and establish justice therewith (i.e. judge men with truth and justice).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet among the people of Moses there was a nation who preached the truth and acted justly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Among the people of Moses is a community that guides by truth, and thereby does justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And among the people of Moses is a community which guides by truth and by it establishes justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:159] And among the people of Moses there is a community, a group, who guide, people, by the truth and act   justly according to it, when passing judgements.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And of Moses' folk there is a community) a group (who lead with) enjoin (truth and establish justice therewith) they act upon the Truth. These are those beyond the river al-Raml.
